ygData.subject: Re: Tanks vs Spellcasters
ygData.msgSnippet: when i made my druid, i fell in love with her (she s a wood elf, so how can ya not? heh j/k). i got to level 6 in 6 hours, and got her to level 12 in 48 hours
ygData.messageBody:
when i made my druid, i fell in love with her (she's a wood elf, so how can
ya not? heh j/k). i got to level 6 in 6 hours, and got her to level 12 in
48 hours of playing time. i havent played her much since i got to 20 with
my enchanter, but it's a great combo of tank, healer and caster class. fun!

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 20th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 10:59 AM 6/3/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
>I've read in a lot of places that spellcasters had a hard time at the start
>( up to level 5 lets say ).
